name: Get Found In Town
tagline: Web Design, Internet Marketing, SEO Company
description:
Get Found In Town is an internet advertising agency that specializes in Internet Marketing, Website Design and SEO for small to medium size businesses. GFIT helps businesses get recognized through dynamic Search Engine Marketing (SEM) Google Plus as well as Yahoo Local and Bing Local.
In addition, GFIT provides Social Media Marketing (SMM) services which includes strategically placing your product, service or brand in front of millions of web users that religiously participate in social networking.
